title: What you should know about the MOVEit ransomware attack
description: U.S. officials are still assessing the impact of the attack.

title: The do’s and don’ts of posting photos of your kid on social media
description: Consider asking your child’s permission before you post and other guidelines for parents.

title: Reddit CEO compares moderators to aristocracy as blackout stretches on
description: Reddit CEO Steve Huffman slammed the unpaid volunteer moderators leading protests over Reddit's push to charge money to third-party apps.

title: In a first, FTC charges genetic testing firm over failure to protect data
description: The Federal Trade Commission faulted 1Helath.io, formerly known as Vitagene, with failing to protect consumers' genetic information.

title: Anyone can Photoshop now, thanks to AI’s latest leap
description: A new “generative fill” AI capability can both create joyful Photoshop edits — and frightening deepfakes.
